heading: D grade bollywood
review: Let me begin by saying that trailers portray an entirely different overview of a film. When I watched the trailer for this movie I assumed it would be an entertaining horror flick. I assumed wrong. The story is your average ghost taking possession of a body" leading towards suicide of the possessed person
column3: cop interrogating the death & a religious person solving the mystery. The plot is weak
column5: the direction is amateur and the camera work is clumsy. If you absolutely adore horror genre and have 2 hours to waste then be my guest and watch this film but let me warn you
